text: Rotala is a genus of plants. It belongs to the loosestrife family. Several species are used as aquarium plants. Species include: *Rotala andamanensis *Rotala densiflora *Rotala hippuris *Rotala indica *Rotala malabarica *Rotala malampuzhensis *Rotala manipurensis *Rotala ramosior *Rotala rotundifolia *Rotala kanayensis Rijuraj et al. *Rotala wallichii "Whorly Rotala" == References == *Flora of China Category:Myrtales
title: Rotala (plant)
